message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this amazing product! It's a unique opportunity to get a great deal. I'm willing to sell it to you for $120.
I'm interested in the product, but $120 is a bit steep for me. I'm willing to pay $90 for it.
I understand you're looking for a better deal, Bob. I can see you're willing to pay $90, but I need to make a profit. I'm willing to meet you in the middle at $110.
I appreciate your willingness to meet me in the middle, but $110 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $95 for the product.
I'm willing to make another concession, Bob. I can see you're really interested in the product, and I want to make a deal. I'm willing to go down to $105, but that's as low as I can go.
I appreciate your willingness to compromise, but $105 is still a bit too high for me. I'm willing to pay $100 for the product.
